entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse When @realDonaldTrump learned that the #coronavirus was mainly taking the lives of older Americans & persons of color, he retreated. We STILL don't have a plan and 120,000 Americans have DIED from his craven inaction. So you need to GTFOH with this bullshit. #TrumpResignNow
